name: A-Bomb (HAS)
details: Rick Jones has been Hulk's best bud since day one, but now he's more than a friend...he's a teammate! Transformed by a Gamma energy explosion, A-Bomb's thick, armored skin is just as strong and powerful as it is blue. And when he curls into action, he uses it like a giant bowling ball of destruction!

name: A.I.M.
details: AIM is a terrorist organization bent on destroying the world.

name: Abomination (Emil Blonsky)
details: Formerly known as Emil Blonsky, a spy of Soviet Yugoslavian origin working for the KGB, the Abomination gained his powers after receiving a dose of gamma radiation similar to that which transformed Bruce Banner into the incredible Hulk.

name: Adam Warlock
details: Adam Warlock is an artificially created human who was born in a cocoon at a scientific complex called The Beehive.

name: Agent X (Nijo)
details: Originally a partner of the mind-altering assassin Black Swan, Nijo spied on Deadpool as part of the Swan's plan to exact revenge for Deadpool falsely taking credit for the Swan's assassination of the Four Winds crime family, which included Nijo's brother.

name: Alex Wilder
details: Despite being the only one of the Runaways without any superhuman abilities or tech, Alex Wilder became the de facto leader of the group due to his natural leadership skills and intellect, as well as prodigy-level logic and strategy.

name: Amun
details: Amun is a ruthless teenage assassin, employed by the Sisterhood of the Wasp to serve under the mage Vincent after Araña interrupted the ritual to initiate the Wasp's new chosen one.

name: Arnim Zola
details: The frail, dwarfish Arnim Zola was born in 1930s Switzerland where he became the world's leading biochemist and genetic engineer.

name: Avengers
details: Earth's Mightiest Heroes joined forces to take on threats that were too big for any one hero to tackle. With a roster that has included Captain America, Iron Man, Ant-Man, Hulk, Thor, Wasp and dozens more over the years, the Avengers have come to be regarded as Earth's No. 1 team.

name: Azazel (Mutant)
details: A mutant from biblical times, Azazel is the ruler of the Neyaphem and claims that the Earth and everything on it belongs to him.

name: Banshee (Theresa Rourke)
details: The daughter of former X-Men member Sean Cassidy, a.k.a. Banshee, and Maeve Rourke, Theresa Rourke was raised by her first cousin once removed, mutant terrorist Thomas Cassidy, a.k.a. Black Tom.
